Posts.EditableText: Recently I had to format my computer, what means I have to reinstall Quest once again. As I'm not in a hurry, should I install version 5.8 or should I wait for the release of Quest 6?
Posts.HTML: Recently I had to format my computer, what means I have to reinstall Quest once again. As I'm not in a hurry, should I install version 5.8 or should I wait for the release of Quest 6?
